Name: Khalaf
description:
Khalaf is 44-year-old lives in Swaileh and married man with six children. Khalaf is a responsible, ‎welcoming and pleasant man and he is working hard to provide the best life for his family.

He started working as peddler selling cleaning materials using his van. He has applied for a loan in order to improve his ‎business and buy new products to sell to increase his income. Please help Khalaf to meet his goals; he ‎needs your support.‎
